rule_40.title: Arrangements for training persons in first-aid
key_requirements: Adequate training arrangements for first-aid personnel
Provision of prescribed equipment
Speedy removal arrangements to dispensary/hospital
Proper ambulance van or suitable vehicle

rule_41.title: First-aid qualifications
key_requirements: St. John's Ambulance Association (India) certificate
Qualified nurse, dresser, compounder-cum-dresser or medical practitioner
Valid first-aid certificate holder

rule_44.title: First-aid stations
key_requirements: Above ground: at shaft tops, workshops, screening plants, every 50+ workers
Opencast: 1 station per 50 persons
Below ground: shaft bottoms, haulage drives, district entrances
Equipment as per Third Schedule

rule_45.title: Carrying of first-aid outfit by officials
key_requirements: Overman, foreman, sirdar, mate, shot-firer, blaster, electrician, mechanic must carry
Outfit contents: 1 large sterilised dressing, 1 small sterilised dressing, iodine/antiseptic
Securely packed against dirt and water

rule_45a.title: Medical attention in case of injury
key_requirements: Immediate reporting of injury to official
Official arranges first-aid
Medical practitioner called if necessary
Person in charge of nearest first-aid station to render aid

rule_emergency_prep.title: Emergency preparedness and evacuation procedures
key_requirements: Familiarize yourself with all emergency exit routes before starting work
Follow illuminated emergency exit signs during evacuation
Stay low to the ground in smoky conditions to access cleaner air
Assist injured colleagues during evacuation when safe to do so
If an exit is blocked, immediately find an alternative route
Proceed to the nearest refuge chamber if escape is impossible
Move quickly but calmly, helping others and avoiding panic
Report your location and status to rescue teams when in refuge chamber
visual_elements: Mine map with highlighted escape routes
Refuge chamber with air supply and communication equipment
Miners walking calmly along exit tunnel
Miner entering refuge chamber and using communication device

rule_safety_drills.title: Safety drills and emergency training
key_requirements: Participate in regular emergency evacuation drills
Know the location and operation of all safety equipment
Practice emergency procedures under supervision
Report any safety concerns immediately to supervisors
Maintain calm and follow instructions during emergencies
